channel.title: Adding xp when you join the server

item.title: Adding xp when you join the server
item.dc:creator: @archerkill30 archerkill30
item.description:
@archerkill30 wrote:

found this in player.java

if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 10; playerXP[i] = 1155; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

The (i == 3) is the hp and you start of with “playerLevel[i] = 10;” 10 out of 10 hp and “playerXP[i] = 1155;” is how much xp it is. The stuff below it is for every skill so if I put it at 3 I would get 3 xp in every skill

So what I was wondering because I messed with this for a while and kept getting error’s how do I add 2 other
“if (i == 3) {
playerLevel[i] = 10;
playerXP[i] = 1155;”
without getting any error’s[br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 09:15:57 PM[/size][hr]Please and thank you

Read full topic
item.source: Adding xp when you join the server

item.title: Adding xp when you join the server
item.dc:creator: @archerkill30 archerkill30
item.description:
@archerkill30 wrote:

Well I would like to add

[code]addSkillXP((737627*playerLevel[2]), 2);

addSkillXP((61512*playerLevel[0]), 0);	

addSkillXP((101333*playerLevel[1]), 3);[/code]

When you join my server but I’m just wondering where I should add it.
